author: big_tech_sux
content: what is the `additionalProperties` field in the `execution-apis` repo?

author: big_tech_sux
content:
i see it is always set to false --
```
~/src-references/execution-apis $ git grep additionalProperties
src/eth/execute.yaml:      additionalProperties: false
src/eth/fee_market.yaml:      additionalProperties: false
src/schemas/block.yaml:  additionalProperties: false
src/schemas/block.yaml:  additionalProperties: false
src/schemas/client.yaml:      additionalProperties: false
src/schemas/filter.yaml:  additionalProperties: false
src/schemas/receipt.yaml:  additionalProperties: false
src/schemas/receipt.yaml:  additionalProperties: false
src/schemas/state.yaml:  additionalProperties: false
src/schemas/state.yaml:  additionalProperties: false
src/schemas/transaction.yaml:  additionalProperties: false
src/schemas/transaction.yaml:  additionalProperties: false
src/schemas/withdrawal.yaml:  additionalProperties: false
```
